statements: SELECT * FROM project_tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE team_member_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name FROM project_tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC, task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE team_member_id = 3 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks WHERE team_member_id = 2 AND deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM project_tasks WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE team_member_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assigned_member_id = 3;
SELECT task_name AS Task, deadline AS Due_Date FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, deadline, assigned_member_id FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks INNER JOIN team_members ON tasks.assigned_member_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline, assigned_member_id FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_id FROM tasks WHERE assigned_member_id = 3 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline, team_members.member_name FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assigned_member_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT task_name, deadline, member_name FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assigned_member_id = team_members.member_id ORDER BY deadline ASC, member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, assigned_member FROM tasks;
SELECT deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assigned_member = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks JOIN deadlines ON tasks.task_id = deadlines.task_id WHERE deadline_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT task_name, assigned_member FROM tasks WHERE assigned_member = 'John Doe' AND deadline >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC, task_name ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN team_members ON tasks.assigned_member = team_members.member_name WHERE team_members.member_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE assigned_member_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT task_name, member_name FROM tasks JOIN task_assignments ON tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id JOIN team_members ON task_assignments.member_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT * FROM project_info WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT t.task_name, tm.member_name FROM tasks t JOIN task_assignments ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id JOIN team_members tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_info WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assigned_team_member FROM tasks WHERE assigned_team_member = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM project_tasks GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_team_member FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT project_name, project_deadline FROM projects WHERE project_deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members ORDER BY member_id;
SELECT t.task_name, tm.member_name FROM tasks t JOIN team_tasks tt ON t.task_id = tt.task_id JOIN team_members tm ON tt.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE tm.member_role = 'Developer';
